data.title: Who Is Courteney Cox’s Boyfriend? Johnny McDaid’s Age & Relationship History

data.text:
Courteney Cox has long been a beloved figure in television and film, with her iconic role as Monica Geller on Friends securing her place in pop culture history. Now, fans are increasingly curious about her personal life, especially her romantic relationships. So, who is Courteney Cox’s boyfriend, Johnny McDaid?

In this article, we will explore more about Courteney Cox’s boyfriend, Johnny McDaid, and delve into their relationship timeline.

Who is Courteney Cox dating?

Courteney Cox is dating Johnny McDaid.

Courteney Cox recently celebrated her boyfriend Johnny McDaid’s 58th birthday with a heartfelt tribute on Instagram. The post featured a radiant selfie of the couple, glimpses of McDaid performing live on stage, and even a shot of him in a flight simulator. Cox also wrote a sweet note for her boyfriend in the caption.

What is Johnny McDaid’s age?

Born on July 24, 1976, John McDaid is a 48-year-old Northern Irish singer, songwriter, and record producer. As a prominent member of the band Snow Patrol, McDaid has made significant contributions to the music industry. McDaid has also collaborated with renowned artists such as Ed Sheeran and P!nk.

Courteney Cox and Johnny McDaid’s relationship history

Courteney Cox and Johnny McDaid’s romance began in an unexpected way at a lively house party at Cox’s Los Angeles home, as per PEOPLE. The gathering, hosted by Cox’s friend Christa Miller, included notable guests like Ed Sheeran, Taylor Swift, and Snow Patrol members, including McDaid. Their connection became evident when they were spotted together at Jennifer Aniston’s holiday party in December 2013. By March 2014, the couple made their first official appearance together at a Cinemagic event in Santa Monica.

Their engagement was announced in June 2014, but by December of the same year, they had called it off. Despite the split, they were seen together again in March 2016, spending time with Cox’s daughter, Coco. After rekindling their relationship, the couple marked a public appearance at the BMI Pop Awards in May 2016. The couple’s relationship faced challenges, including a period of separation due to the COVID-19 pandemic, but their bond remained strong.
